thread.title: Pregnant Beyonce celebrates stepfather Richard Lawson's 70th birthday with loved ones
thread.title_full: Pregnant Beyonce celebrates stepfather Richard Lawson's 70th birthday with loved ones

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Pregnant Beyonce celebrates stepfather Richard Lawson's 70th birthday with loved ones
text:
Pregnant Beyonce celebrates stepfather Richard Lawson's 70th birthday with loved ones The Bootylicious star dined with her fellow guests at the bash on Tuesday Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Beyonce attends stepdad Richard Lawson's birthday meal Share this video Get celebs   Could   
Beyonce stepped out to celebrate her stepfather's birthday as she continues to prepare for motherhood. 
The singer - who is pregnant with twins - was at the District by Hannah An restaurant as her mum Tina threw her husband Richard Lawson a surprise bash to mark the big day. 
He turned 70 on Tuesday, and Bey was part of the 14-strong party celebrating the special occasion, including her BFF and former Destiny's Child bandmate Kelly Rowland. Beyonce attends her step-dad Richard Lawson's birthday dinner (Photo: mstinalawson/Instagram) She looked relaxed at the surprise party (Photo: mstinalawson/Instagram) 
Meanwhile, the star - who is expecting twins with her husband Jay Z - recently shared a sweet video for her 96 million fans on the social media website, showing off her style during award season, with her figure on display in a number of outfits. 
Amongst the candid images are snaps of the star cradling her growing baby bump. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Beyonce releases new video showing off baby bump Share this video Beyonce shared the pregnancy snaps with her fans (Photo: Beyonce.com) She posted them on her website (Photo: Beyonce.com) 
She can also be seen removing her makeup in one shot, and posing with her hip hop hubby in a cute moment. 
Other pictures include Bey in a stylish turquoise gown - which perfectly frames her pregnant figure - and some close-up looks at her jewellery. The montage included other candid snaps (Photo: Instagram/beyonce) Beyonce and Jay Z (Photo: Instagram/beyonce) 
The Bad Romance star, who will be touring this year, will be filling in for the Drunk In Love singer on April 15 and April 22. She also shared this sweet selfie with Blue Ivy (Photo: beyonce/Instagram) 
Confirming early reports, Gaga tweeted on Tuesday: "Let's party in the desert!" 
Beyonce announced that she will no longer be headlining the annual event in after being advised to "keep a less rigorous schedule," but will take to the stage there in 2018 instead. 
The singer's management company Parkwood Entertainment released a joint statement with festival producer Goldenvoice, saying: "Following the advice of her doctors to keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months, Beyoncé has made the decision to forgo performing at the 2017 Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival."
